channel.title: ZenithScape [667/728] Release!
channel.description:
[center] [img]http://i46.tinypic.com/2rvzkzm.png[/img]
ZenithScape 667/721
For People That Have Trouble! [url=http://"http://www.thenewboston.org"]Help Here[/url] [/center] [center] [size=14pt]READ THIS BEFORE COMMENTS[/size] [/center]
First off i wanna say that this is my work! Timers3 came to my server asking me to be codev on it, when he didnt respond for 6 days to anything i got worried and decided to come onto here and see what was going on, i noticed his adv thread and it was adv my server but claiming it his own -.- so i decided to ban him off website and not update dropbox anymore. He then said to me it was my fault and that im a incosiderate dick. Proof he was a codev, pming me on forums on my forums asking me to be codev, ill show pics in a second. So i asked him on here if it was him on my server asking for codev -.- heres his response.
[center] [img]http://puu.sh/OK0N.jpg[/img]
Here are his pms on forums. [img]http://puu.sh/OK7c.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/OK7L.jpg[/img]
Original pm from him asking to be codev and help out, sorry i switched themes on my forums as im adding this last :P [img]http://puu.sh/OL18.jpg[/img] [/center]
Here is our advertisement threads a while back that one of my staff made. look at the date last edited if you have to -.- so ya. http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,551109.msg4038848.html#msg4038848
[center] Now for the info :) hope you enjoy MY SOURCE [/center]
[center] Credits: Matrix Team PDF team for the 562 SPB system RsCalifornia and Devs All my staff and players Dragonkk/Alex <<< hes a boss, a true legend! Lost Soul Team <<< took some stuff from them Whoever released the 721 cache Timers3 for teaching me to realize trust is a valuable thing! -.- Ummm, and some people for snippets i dont remember names though. Tyden, i guess he was to maker of the 562 GE (Never knew, kinda cool to learn somethign today :P)
Things it has: QBD KBD Kalph PlayersOnline if you can make php and sql injection Highscores added Skills all working Dungeoneeering with an Entity Leak, easy fix just make it remove the dungeon npcs when dungeon is over. GE without the sell as Timers has pointed out. Its one Config, configbyfile to be excact but i cbf'd to go through trying to get it rite now. Custom Polypore as i couldnt get the XTEAS Full Jadinko Lair Corp Nex Godwars Full Barrows Glacors Bork Dag Kings Jad Warriors Guild Duel Custom Hararken boss Multi Area Lv 12 Wildy Pk Mage Bank Fight Pits West Pk East Pk Edgeville Prestige System just gotta readd interface. Vote System with 3 different kind of rewards and Epic Vote store NEWEST Items of RS like Dragonbane armor Flamming Skull etc. Tons of pets in-game <<<<< MY custom way of doing it Working Dungeoneering, Hunter, Summoning. Chaotics Steadfast, Ragefire, Glavien Boots ::cmd to open up commands page.
And as stated in credits the SPB system from 562 converted to work in this, i did that to easily add the GE Yes ima noob for doing that but its cool :P you can rip stuff from any of your old 562 projects if you need to :P [/center]
[center] PICS GE From ad thread! [img]http://i48.tinypic.com/hry9dx.png[/img]
Jadinko from ad thread! [img]http://i48.tinypic.com/152j8qv.png[/img]
Polypore from ad thread! [img]http://i47.tinypic.com/15gt5cm.png[/img]
QBD from ad thread, i made it before the xteas were released. [img]http://i49.tinypic.com/vxgkjl.png[/img]
Custom vote point store that goes off of points rather than tokens so it doesnt take up space. Dung works the same way. [img]http://i49.tinypic.com/2gu0gub.png[/img]
Armour slots correctly fitted none of this wierd stuff :P [img]http://puu.sh/OKC9.jpg[/img]
One of the many pets, vulture! [img]http://puu.sh/OKDo.jpg[/img]
Dung shop, works with internall points rather than tokens. i just used the dung gold as a item to be displayed in box. [img]http://puu.sh/OKE9.jpg[/img]
The command central to show commands to players [img]http://puu.sh/OKEK.jpg[/img]
Where the custom kiln is. [img]http://puu.sh/OKFb.jpg[/img]
Use your firecape on the floating orb to initiate har arken. [img]http://puu.sh/OKFx.jpg[/img]
HarArken, tentacles will spawn at random around you and start attackign you. [img]http://puu.sh/OKGi.jpg[/img]
Summoning interface lites up when your pouch can be made. [img]http://puu.sh/OKHx.jpg[/img]
Pouch gets made when you click it. [img]http://puu.sh/OKHZ.jpg[/img]
Custom farming where it has timers and stuff, i started on playeronly world objects for it but never finished. [img]http://puu.sh/OKJ8.jpg[/img]
Then after picking the allotment or herb you get a random amount of that item 1-3 and exp [img]http://puu.sh/OKJN.jpg[/img]
The new cache, shark fists and olympic clothing. [img]http://puu.sh/ORXh.jpg[/img]
And ya thats pretty much alot of stuff that can be done single person, didnt wanna start up another client to show other things -.-
[/center] I am releasing this because timers3 released it after he had agreed not to -.- and because this is after he took it and ran so it has quite a few fixes in it. And also i moved onto a 718 revision and transfered everything over to that well other than the better things. And now thanks to an amazing friend and an awesome trustworthy guy that is legitly one of the people i respect my server is now 718 loading 727 and soon 728 i do believe! :P you know who you are when you read this! :) So i hope you guys all the best and enjoy, remember ask me any questions if you need help im on vacation rite now so i cant help over tv but i can help through pm! :)
[center] [font=impact][size=24pt][u][b]DOWNLOADS[/b][/u][/size][/font] Source: [url=http://www.zenithscape.com/release/Zenith.rar]ZenithScape Server Download Re-Download for 728[/url] (Contains a localclient.jar) Client: [url=http://www.zenithscape.com/release/Zenith Client.rar]Zenithscape Client Download[/url]
For the client WARNINGS fix [quote="yourbad"]i've fixed the client there were warnings in class381.java now you can change the client ip http://screensnapr.com/v/cN0HS1.png
client: http://up.ht/RHcNR2[/quote]
[/center]
I GIVE PERMISSION TO BE RELEASED ON OTHER SITES, JUST CREDIT PLEASE.
In information -> you will find a npc and item dump for 728 that i did just before updating. Enjoy
Password for king zenith is pics
Any other info can be found at the nrs3server v2 thread since that is my source -.- Thanks and if you need help with anything on this pm me. Btw you have to change ip on client and such. And yes the kill lag that timers talks about is fixed in this -.- and there is NO antileech. Have fun! :)
BTW i do respect timers3 he is a chill guy to talk to, when im not pissed at him! :)
